p.s: The speech given on 10 July 2018 in New York of the European American Chamber Commerce, by Michel Barnier is addressed to the listeners of this Chamber of Commerce and other political interrested people.
It thematizes the negative aspects of Brexit and how the EU reacts to them.
Michel Barnier starts the excerpt of the speachspeech by naming his opinion the Brexit, he is clearly against it.
He underlines that the Brexit will have a few negative aspects, like upcoming trade frictions, which has a strong impact on many important sectors.
He saissays summarized that Brexit is bad for both, the UK and the EU.
But he also saissays it's still important to have close relationship with the UK and names ways to achieve this goal.
He names that trading is still possible, but there also might return tariffs to it.
He says that when the UK wants to access the EU market they must agree with the equivalence system.
He stresses that the EU wontwon't change only because the UK left, and the now need to conform to the EU.

Most of the time he speaks pretty objective, but sometimes he changes to his personal opinion, and asks rethoricalrhetorical questions, like Why would this [...] not work for the UK?, in this case he actiulyactually asks the audience to question it themselfsthemselves.
